scripts.setup: npm install && jspm install npm:single-spa && jspm install npm:single-spa-angular1 && jspm install npm:single-spa-jspm && jspm install --unlink && npm run setup-apps
scripts.setup-apps: find ./apps -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd $0 && npm run setup'
scripts.prepare-surge: npm run setup && find ./apps -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd $0 && npm run prepare-surge' && npm run bundle
scripts.linkSingleSpa: cd ../single-spa && jspm link npm:single-spa@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaJspm: cd ../single-spa-jspm && jspm link npm:single-spa-jspm@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-jspm@latest --link
scripts.linkSingleSpaAngular1: cd ../single-spa-angular1 && jspm link npm:single-spa-angular1@latest -y && cd ../single-spa-examples && jspm install npm:single-spa-angular1@latest --link
